manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Why choose Hyper Base PR500? This game hard drive is truly plug-and-play and is easy to operate. No complicated settings are required, and there is no need to install redundant plug-ins. You can play games directly by connecting the device.This video game console has a dual game system that is compatible with more types of games.Retro game console with built in 38291 games, compatible with 50 game emulators, including classic retro games, racing games, arcade games, 3D games, PC games, AAA games, etc.Game emulator is suitable for Windows systems and is compatible with computers, laptops, WIN system handhelds and other devices.The game system supports multiple languages, and you can switch the operating language to your commonly used language.Retro game HDD uses brand original hard drives, and the quality is guaranteed.

Game Console has 2 Game System Playnite Game System Playnite is an open source game system that supports personalization and customization. You can freely set your interface or add games. 2 Game System in 1 This emulator console combines two game systems and has the advantages of both systems. It has a rich variety of games and is compatible with 50 emulators. Owning this gaming hard drive is equivalent to enjoying multiple gaming consoles. Retrobat Game System The Emulation Station interface provided by retrobat is fully functional and highly customizable, and is best suited for retro games and arcade games.

Suitable for a variety of devices The game system is suitable for win8.1 and above systems, so it is suitable for a variety of devices, such as computers, laptops, mini PCs, and handheld game consoles with windows systems.

Support multiple languages Supports English, Spanish, Portuguese, German and other languages, you can switch the language to your common language. Portable Game Console The 2.5-inch original hard drive is mini in size and more portable. You can take it with you on business trips or travel and enjoy gaming time at any time. Controller If you buy the plan that comes with a controller, you'll get a controller with a vibration motor to make you immersed in the game.

Game Resources You can get free FTP with your purchase. In order to better serve our customers, we have created our own game library, which contains a large number of game resources. If you need to download more games, you can ask us for FTP information. We have a complete service and our own technical team. If you encounter difficulties, you can Leave us a message at any time.

Multiplayer Game Supports multiplayer games, you can play games with your family and friends. At the same time, it is definitely a good gift. If you give it to your children, you can play with them to bring the distance between parents and children; if you give it to your friends, you can play classic childhood games together and recall your childhood together; if you give it to your family, you can increase the happiness of the family Entertainment show. Definitely a good holiday gift.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Recommended on youtube. Quick shipping by seller. I had issue with my harware. Seller reached outto me. Thank you.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars 11 viruses - don't put your PC at risk
reviews.reviewText: Plug and play... Plug and infect.....There are MANY great retro game options out there, but this solution included 11 viruses and malware. Running these executables puts your system at risk, and you should not hook this hard drive up to your computer. It is compromised.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Good product but….
reviews.reviewText: I received my hdd a couple of days ago…however I noticed that when I tried to play some of the games they were either:1. Slow to load, sometimes taking up to an hour in some cases2. Wouldn’t open at all.I followed all of the instructions from the product manual but I wasn’t able enough to get things running. I have also tried contact their customer service about this and haven’t heard anything. It’s a bummer because this thing seemed really cool but in theory but in practice….not so much!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: When I ordered this I honestly did not know what to expect. After ordering I realized that my laptop was too old to run this. So I bought a used Dell optiplex i7 7700 micro computer to run it on. Now I have not touched a computer since 2010 prior to this. I'm stating this because it should tell you how easy it is to get up and running. At first I wasn't sure what to do because it does not come with a physical copy of instructions. The first thing I did was scan the drive for any viruses. My scan produced nothing....it gave me the all clear. There are 3 separate files to scan. One is a "install first" file and the other 2 are the 2 different game systems. Anyhow there is also a small file with brief instructions on what to do to get things going. You have to install the "install first" file or batocera will not start. The install first file contains direct x and will fix and add the proper files and extensions you need to run the game systems. When you open the install file scroll down to the direct x file with application written next to it. Open that and follow instructions. Once this is done you can now open retrobat and playnite. To open retrobat click on its file folder and scroll way down until you see retrobat with application written next to it and double click that and your up and running. Its the same process for playnite. Drop and drag a shortcut of retrobat and playnite to your home screen and your all set and can access like any other application you have. Now for the games. All I'm going to say is that if your not happy with what's on this drive your not going to ever be happy....period! The game selection is outstanding! The computer I'm using is running everything I have tried with no problems. Just get a couple x box 360 controllers and a keyboard and mouse and your all set. The ps2 games alone make this a tremendous value. They are fantastic!!! Trust me.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Pretty neat for what it is.
reviews.reviewText: Out of the box, wasn't too sure what I was expecting. The unit arrived in a very small box with a tiny hard drive and a strange cable that I doubt many have laying around. The cable that came with it is extremely short and is pretty much made to sit on top of your desktop.Starting it up was easy as pie, plug it in, open the device and you're greeted with tons of folders, emulators you've never heard of and roms foreign and domestic. In the folders youll have a folder labeled 'install' first and the exe is DirectX repair, I did not install this exe but was still able to boot up the emulator and rons.One thing I wish I knew this beforehand but if you don't have a PC gaming pad, 60-70% of the games are unplayable -- can't really complain cause there's SO many titles on here.There's some more recent games in the play nite folder which has some reaaally good ones. I have had rooms freeze on my multiple times and stop responding within my 3 hours going through and playing some games.All and all for the price, it's great. It has everything you could possibly think of and more. The emulator isn't 100% user friendly and some rooms are hit or miss but overall I'm satisfied with what's here.It's a buy for the retro games, many games work with just a keyboard and there IS options to map out buttons or to simply map your keyboard BUT my key takeaway is to own a PC compatible controller.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 9, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Thankfully I scanned the drive first. Norton came up with 20 infected files. No excuse for this. All the files should of been scanned by seller before including on drive.
